Dear {{ $json["query"]["name"] }},



Thank you for your interest in the {{ $json["query"]["position"] }} position at Talo Media. We appreciate the time and effort you put into submitting your application.

After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that we have decided not to move forward with your application. We received many qualified candidates and unfortunately, we cannot invite everyone to the next stage of the recruitment process.

Please do not be discouraged by this decision. We encourage you to continue exploring other opportunities that align with your interests and qualifications. We appreciate your interest in our company and wish you the best of luck in your future endeavors.

Thank you again for your application and your interest in working with us.

// JSON of the item
$input.item.json.shop = $('Set').all()[0].json.emailContent.split('Shop ')[1]
$input.item.json.shop = $input.item.json.shop.split(':')[0]

$input.item.json.card = $('Set').all()[0].json.emailContent.split(' account ending in ')[1]
$input.item.json.card = $input.item.json.card.split(':')[0]

$input.item.json.money = $('Set').all()[0].json.emailSubject.split('Your funds of ')[1]
$input.item.json.money = $input.item.json.money.split(' ')[0]


return $input.item;

Congratulations on Passing the Interview! Let's Begin Your New Journey!

Dear {{ $json.query.name }},

I hope this email finds you in good spirits. I am delighted to inform you that you have successfully passed the interview process for the [Job Position] at [Company Name]. Congratulations on this significant achievement!

 

Your exceptional qualifications, skills, and experience truly impressed our hiring team. We believe you will be a valuable addition to our company and make a positive impact in your role. We are thrilled to offer you the position, and we are excited to have you join our team.

 

We would like to officially extend an offer for you to start your employment with us on {{ $json.query.workingtime }}. We have great confidence in your abilities and are confident that you will quickly become an integral part of our organization. Please review the attached employment agreement, which outlines the terms and conditions of your employment.

 

Before your start date, we kindly request that you complete the necessary paperwork, including signing the employment agreement and providing any additional documents as specified in the offer. This will ensure a smooth onboarding process and allow us to prepare for your arrival. If you have any questions or require further information, please feel free to reach out to our HR department, and they will be more than happy to assist you.

We have a comprehensive orientation program designed to introduce you to our company culture, policies, and procedures. During this time, you will have the opportunity to meet your team members and get acquainted with your responsibilities. We believe that this onboarding experience will set you up for success in your new role.

 

Once again, congratulations on securing the position! We are confident that your skills, knowledge, and enthusiasm will contribute to our continued growth and success. We eagerly await your arrival and look forward to working with you.

If you require any further information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to support you throughout this transition.

 

Please check out this button to confirm that you will start your first working day at: {{ $json.query.workingtime }}

Interview Result

Subject: Update Regarding Your Job Application at [Company Name]

 

Dear {{ $json.query.name }},

 

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to personally reach out to you regarding your recent job interview for the {{ $json.query.position}} at our company. After careful consideration and evaluation, we regret to inform you that your application has not been successful on this occasion.

 

Please know that our decision was not an easy one, as we had the opportunity to meet many talented individuals throughout the interview process. We sincerely appreciate the time and effort you invested in applying for the position and participating in the interview.

 

We want to emphasize that the outcome of this particular application should not discourage you from pursuing other opportunities. We recognize that each candidate brings unique strengths and experiences, and our decision is solely based on the specific requirements of this position and the competitive nature of the selection process.

 

We encourage you to continue exploring other avenues and applying for positions that align with your skills and career aspirations. We genuinely hope that you find the perfect opportunity that allows you to showcase your talents and contribute to an organization that appreciates your potential.

 

We appreciate your interest in our company and thank you for considering us as a potential employer. We wish you all the best in your future endeavors and hope that you find success in your professional journey.

 

If you have any questions or require feedback regarding your application or interview process, please feel free to reach out to us. We are more than willing to provide you with constructive feedback to assist you in your career development.

Once again, thank you for your time and effort. We wish you the very best for your future endeavors, and we hope our paths may cross again under different circumstances.

 

Sincerely,

parameters.jsCode:
const data = $('Webhook').first().json.body
let order_id
let is_true_tx = false
let regex = /DCGR\d{5}/
let match = data.description.match(regex)

const bankAccount = '6681888888'
const isBankAccount = data.bank_sub_acc_id == bankAccount ? true: false
if (match && isBankAccount) {
  is_true_tx = true
  order_id = match[0]
}

let total_receive = data.amount
return {
  is_true_tx,
  order_id,
  total_receive
}

parameters.jsCode:
const data = $('get_list_record').first().json.data
const order = data.items.find(forItem => forItem.fields.order_id === $('get_order_id_from_tx').first().json.order_id)
let isValidRecordId = !!order?.record_id
if (!order) return {isValidRecordId}
let order_id = order?.fields.order_id
let record_id = order?.record_id
let moneyReceive = $('get_order_id_from_tx').first().json.total_receive
console.log(moneyReceive)
let moneyTotal = order?.fields.total
// thằng chuyển nhiều tiền hơn orderTotal
let moneyRest = (moneyTotal-moneyReceive)>0 ? moneyTotal-moneyReceive : moneyTotal-moneyReceive
let statusPayment = $('check_is_true_tx').first().json.total_receive === moneyTotal?'Đã thanh toán đủ':'Đã thanh toán một phần'
console.log(order)
let email = order?.fields.email
return {
  isValidRecordId,
  email,
  statusPayment,
  moneyReceive,
  moneyTotal,
  moneyRest,
  record_id,
  order_id,
  order_data: order?.fields
}
